mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sale_returns_sheet (id, sale_sheet_id, supplier, operator, remark, state, create_time, salesman, raw_total_amount, discount, final_amount, voucher_amount) VALUES (#{id}, #{saleSheetId}, #{supplier}, #{operator}, #{remark}, #{state}, #{createTime},#{salesman},#{rawTotalAmount},#{discount}, #{finalAmount},#{voucherAmount});

INSERT INTO sale_returns_sheet_content (sale_returns_sheet_id, pid, quantity, total_price, unit_price, remark) VALUES
(#{item.saleReturnsSheetId},#{item.pid},#{item.quantity},#{item.totalPrice},#{item.unitPrice},#{item.remark})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM sale_returns_sheet ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT 1
